title: EastEnders fans horrified as Big Mo reveals details of her sex life
text:
EastEnders has something of a reputation when it comes to revealing big secrets, but viewers certainly got more than they bargained for during last night’s episode, when Big Mo (Laila Morse) went into details about her sex life, as a horrified Kat (Jessie Wallace) and Jean (Gillian Wright) listened on.

An optimistic Jean whistled while doing the dishes in the Slater household, and Kat — amused by Jean’s good mood — relayed to Big Mo how it was clear that Jean was ‘getting some’.

Smiling, Mo retorted how Jean’s ‘not the only one.’ Horrified by Mo’s response, Kat made it clear that she didn’t want to know by telling her to nan to ‘shut up’, but — determined to brag about her sex life — Mo refused to hold back.

She told Kat that ‘it doesn’t stop at 80’, before trying to make a deal with Jean to spill the details about her sex life in exchange for what she gets up to with Fat Elvis.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Viewers were in stitches at Mo’s comments, and wasted little time in taking to social media.

Catching up on EastEnders and Big Mo just mentioned her sex life with Fat Elvis… — damo18 (@damo184) October 11, 2019

Shockingly, this isn’t the first time that Mo has mentioned what she gets up to in the bedroom either, as — earlier this year — she tried to flirt with Daniel (Adrain Edmondson) in the cafe as an amused Stuart (Ricky Champ) watched on.

Daniel wasted little time in rebuffing her advances and she said: ‘I won’t bite.’

She also made a cheeky innuendo on this occasion as well, as she discussed her and Fat Elvis’ bedroom antics in a scene which had viewers in stitches.

Oh, Mo!

EastEnders continues on Friday 11th October at 8pm on BBC One.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Viewers got more than they bargained for!
